data.title: Jeffrey A. Senger Obituary 2020
data.meta_description: Jeffrey A. Senger, 48 of Santa Maria CA passed away unexpectedly in his home on April 21, 2020.Jeffrey Senger, son of Edward "Eddie" and Mary Eva (Heisler) Senger was born on Oc...
data.text:
Jeffrey A. Senger, 48 of Santa Maria CA passed away unexpectedly in his home on April 21, 2020.

Jeffrey Senger, son of Edward “Eddie” and Mary Eva (Heisler) Senger was born on October 1, 1971 in Lakewood, CA. In 1986, the family moved to Nipomo CA. Jeffrey attended St. Cyprian Parish School through the 8th grade and graduated from Arroyo Grande High School in Arroyo Grande CA.

Jeffrey lived and worked in California through the years. He was the Assistant Manager for Dewey Pest Control for many years, until a back injury forced him to retire in 2010.

Jeffrey had a passion for music and would spend hours burning CD’s of his favorite music. He was a very talented, creative individual. He made hundreds of beautiful pieces of jewelry; necklaces, bracelets, etc. and lovingly shared them with family and friends. Jeff was witty, smart, funny and had great perseverance in anything he did. He was so very loved and will be greatly missed.

Jeffrey was preceded in death by his mother, Mary Heisler Kraft in 2003, his grandparents and many aunts and uncles. His father Eddie Senger went home to the Lord on May 18, 2020 and was united with his beloved son Jeff.

Jeffrey’s loving family include his brothers Robert (Gayle) Senger, Lake Forest CA and Stan (Lynn Jahnke) Senger, Mesa AZ; nephew Colton Senger and niece Sheridan Senger; step mother Emma Senger Santa Maria CA; step sister Heather (Dan) McLaughlin and step brother Gary (Susan) Hunter all of La Verne CA; step nephews Nolan Nehring and Joshua Hunter; step nieces Megan Nehring, Caitlyn Hunter and Emily Hunter and great step niece Elara Nehring; aunts and uncles Carol and David Bertsch, Kaye Volk, Joanne Maggard, Mary Jane and Kenny Volk and Shirley Faber and many cousins.

Mass of Christian Burial for Jeffrey will be held on Monday, July 13, 2020 at 10:00 a.m. at St. Joseph Catholic Church, Devils Lake ND with a Rosary at 9:30 a.m. This funeral Mass will also be offered for his father Eddie Senger. Burial will be in St. Joseph’s Catholic Cemetery beside his mother Mary Eva Kraft.
